alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 12:55PM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at Shawneetown. .Heavy rainfall that occurred Thursday continues to cause rises on the Ohio River. The river will rise above flood stage at these locations between tonight and Monday, and remain above flood stage through next week. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, and Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 30.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to 39.4 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
